name: VNImageCropAndScaleOption
desc: Options that define how Vision crops and scales an input image.

items.name: case centerCrop
items.desc: An option that scales the image to fit its shorter side within the input dimensions, while preserving its aspect ratio, and center crops the image.

items.name: case scaleFill
items.desc: An option that scales the image to fill the input dimensions, resizing it if necessary.

items.name: case scaleFit
items.desc: An option that scales the image to fit its longer side within the input dimensions, while preserving its aspect ratio, and center crops the image.
